website_summaries.verdict: Using this blender is a pain, but once you get it up and running, it can keep up with machines that are more than twice as expensive.
pros: For $150, the Oster Versa gives you the tools you need to blend anything you can think to throw at it
cons: Managing its many accessories is confusing and tedious, and a lot of the plastic pieces are flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: This blender far exceeded our expectations. The reversing feature is what blenders have needed all along! A few things I really liked: 1) the large container is quite large; I made gazpacho with 64 oz. of tomato juice plus veggies in one go. 2) I thought I'd hate the plastic containers, but they are very sturdy and lightweight, so I'm very happy. 3) the blend'n'go cups are popular with the young adults in the family. 4) The smoothie setting is amazing. Just set it and get a minute or so of cheap entertainment as it goes through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyK

customer_reviews.title: Veggie smoothies for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this beast every week day for a month to make protein/veggie/banana smoothies. We love it. It chops up the kale and spinach without issue. My 5 yo LOVES the "automatic smoothie cycle", often yelling over the blender "look mommy!!!! It's going on its own!!!". The smoothies come out smooth everytime, no matter how much kale we put in. It crushes up ice like a champ. The smoothie bottles that screw directly on are nice. I haven't used the food processor bits yet, but they feel heavy duty enough. I'm super pleased with this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for pesto, hummus, smoothies, shredding vegetables or some other kitchen prep 1-3 days a week. We are pretty choosy for what keeps a place in our kitchen and this continues to earn its spot. We also had great customer service from the company. We had broken off the food processor catches and wrote to the company to buy a replacement when they just sent us one for free! We have burned out one prior Oster blender after weeks of nearly daily use and if that ever happens with this one (doubtful because it handles full ice cubes with ease, especially with the reversing action), I think we will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Man

customer_reviews.title: Food processor is a throw away, warranty does NOT cover anything but motor assembly
customer_reviews.text: This has become a great frustration because the food processor that comes with the unit is a throw away. The blender parts including blade, seals, pitcher are NOT covered in the warranty. Customer service on the phone was great the first three times the food processor failed. **** Initially I posted that this was a great bargain and an excellent product but as I said the food processor is inferior. It's not suitable to mixes, breads, spreads, or anything that thickens. Mine died mixing pancake batter. Very loud and is prone to walk across the counter. Maybe the PRO version is better? FYI, written correspondence with customer service got a bit nasty, so I advise call on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: jsumr110

customer_reviews.title: Their warranty is real!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender 3 years ago, recently it wasn’t working very well. I contact Oster to see what they could do as there is a 7 years warranty. First of all, great customer service, quick and efficient, they told me to send my blender back to them so they could check the problem. Within a week a had a brand new blender/food processor set sent to me. Amazing how fast and good they were in keeping their warranty word. Just amazing! Thank you Oster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I sent another brand back and got this instead. BEST DECISION! I'm small space living and so appliances have to serve multiple purposes. This one DOES IT. Great features and it chews the ice up for icy drinks better than any one I've tried. The vessel is plastic, not glass, and I really thought I wouldn't like that but so far, ya, I think I prefer it!
customer_reviews.author: DFR

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. My wife makes smoothies all the time. I bought ice cube trays that makes little cubes for use in blenders. That helped a ton. With big cubes the instructions say only put them in until they float. If you are expecting thick icy drinks you will need smaller cubes. The single containers that it comes with are a joke. The tops are awful and don't' stay shut - at all. I don't know how something so poorly engineered could had made it into production.
customer_reviews.author: zippy

customer_reviews.title: I loved it in the beginning, now it's not so great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May 2016. Within the first 6 months the original gasket used with the smaller cups broke. I was using the cups to blend a hot drink, so I consider that my issue. Although there was nothing that I can remember reading that said not to use this with hot liquids. Now I can't use the pre-programmed function for smoothies. When the blades go in reverse the "post" unscrews. I can screw it back in and use the forward functions but I want to use the programmed functions. I purchased a warranty with this. What do I do now?
customer_reviews.author: J. Lindhorst

customer_reviews.title: Great medium duty blender
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I use it nearly every morning and it's performance never disappoints me. It is not really good at making nut butters (the 1400 watt model is better for that), but for a powerful, versatile blender, I'm very pleased. I use it to grind flax seed, oat greats, make smoothies, and crush ice. The food processor attachment works fine for chopping, slicing or shredding via two attachments, included. So far no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Adamczyk

customer_reviews.title: GREAT blender!
customer_reviews.text: This blender ROCKS! This is by far the best blender I have ever owned. I read the other reviews and was concerned about the leaking issues, and how some people said it wasn't very well made. I liked the concept so much I decided to take a chance, and I am so glad I did. I have had no issues at all, and in my humble opinion, this is a freaking awesome, well made, reliable blender and I use it EVERYDAY day! I have recommended it to another friend, and she loves it too, so I'm not sure if Oster fixed the issues, or they were just flukes, but I LOVE mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Loving the New Blender
customer_reviews.text: I love my new blender. This sucker whips the crap out of my smoothies. We use almond milk, protein powder, frozen berries, spinach and flax. It can get my smoothie very smooth. It even has a smoothie setting. I haven't used the food processor piece yet but I've used everything else. It is a great value for what you get and the speed and motor power can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ssofrigid

customer_reviews.title: O-ring fails and safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Was a 5 star review until this happened. The O-ring in the blade fails and comes out. Enjoy eating this piece of plastic in your smoothie around month four right after the return period is up. The only fix is to replace the $9 blade. Soon after the O-ring comes out the entire blade blows up causing a big mess and perhaps damage to yourself. I should have know this was garbage made by the Sunbeam Corporation. Note everything made by Sunbeam fails quickly and is a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: We have used it daily for a couple of months now and have been very happy. Love the smoothie function
customer_reviews.text: We make smoothies every single day here. My previous blender broke so I did lots of research on what model to replace it with. I decided to go mid price range, and ended with this one as it was the only one I could find that has a metal to metal connection on the base between the motor and the blades. This is the part that broke on my previous blender. Most are metal to plastic. We have used it daily for a couple of months now and have been very happy. Love the smoothie function. Just press button and walk away. It is VERY loud, but that's sort of expected for the power of the motor.
customer_reviews.author: 4sunshines

customer_reviews.title: ... gadgets I have bought lately that I am very satisfied with. It makes smoothies very well and quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product originally. It just has a slight problem with the part where the blade screws into the canister. It leaks just a little even when fully tightened. You also have to be careful that the jar doesn't jump off the machine or the lid doesn't pop off as high speed smoothies blast upward. Overall it works great but you have to be careful with the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a regretful purchase I had to return. The food processor broke the first time using it shredding some cheese! The plastic shard that came off ended up in the cheese and I didn't know it. It wasn't like I heard or crack or anything, because the machine is very loud when using it. I am so grateful I didn't swallow it! The blender often leaked if not perfectly sealed. Did I mention how LOUD this thing is. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a Thursday afternoon, and selected free prime 2-day shipping. I got the blender the next day, midday. Everything is as shown. I've blended 2 smoothies in the to go cups. Very easy to use, but VERY, VERY loud. I guess it's a trade off for the fact that after 2 blending sessions, I can tell this is the best at-home blender I've ever seen. All the attachments (blending cups, canisters) are plastic. I was surprised as i thought they'd be glass. I guess i didn't read well enough. I've already promoted this blender using this Amazon url on my Facebook. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamix Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Blends very well, pulverizes ice and frozen fruit quickly, love the to go bottles (the handles eventually broke but no biggie), and I like the programmed settings. I however can't stand when things like this come with loose rubber O rings, I've already lost two and that makes the pitchers they go to useless until I find a replacement. Ninja manages to make processors without these rings so I know it can be done!
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender
customer_reviews.text: I don't have time for reviews but this one is worth the time to write. I have owned so many blenders. I love this blender. For what you get for the price it can not be beat. It's light weight, plastic, no glass to break, super powerful and has a great smoothie feature. Love the individual smoothie jars and the food processor made Thanksgiving so much less work. Love love this and hope it lasts me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blender for my wife to make smoothies in the morning. The ice-chopping mode of this blender is awesome as it pulses to break up and move the ice around before pulsing again. We haven't tried the food processing accessories yet. The 2 included smoothie cups are great for their purpose. The only complaint I have is that the flip covers for the mouths of the cups have VERY small hinge nubs and have a tendency to come free. Other than that, this mixer is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: @GroupOfFour

customer_reviews.title: Used it everyday for 4 weeks. Always added extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it everyday for 4 weeks. Always added extra water when making smoothies. However the machine fell apart. When I called customer service....it was a nightmare. Have called three time and don't have it the issue resolved. However I have a ticket number with no resolution and the machine is still tore up. If you are seriously gong to use your blender then don't buy this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Chameleon Consultant

customer_reviews.title: died after 3.5yrs of light use
customer_reviews.text: Loved ability to use a mason jar for nut butter, etc. Was great at blending ice as long as there was enough liquid. However, this blender had no ability to tap down. If you didn't have enough liquid, the blender created an air pocket between the blade and material you were trying to blend. It seems they tried to solve this by allowing blade to reverse. Worked ok. However, I think that shortened the life of the motor. Sounds like it threw a bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...does blend smoothies, for sure...good power and auto settings, could be quieter (give it a muffler), is quite tall under the standard kitchen cupboards (just fits), had trouble screwing/threading bottom back on after taking apart to clean (note: must screw on slowly and perfectly into threads or it will leak...a lot)... kind of a weird fit. Stainless cutters (a plus) are what all blenders should have...and reverse adds to the function.
customer_reviews.author: hghome

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more control. It is a nice versatile mixer but it lacks the functionality of other mixers. It makes up for it with the attachments. It is a decent food processor. If making smoothies make sure you start with fruit in bottom not the ice. Ice bogs the motor a bit. I got this unit cheap on a black Friday special. Was worth it
customer_reviews.author: lalaland

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Variety of Foods!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom when she was looking for a new blender, Nashe absolutely loves it! She loves to cook and always makes a variety of foods, so I thinks this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Soledad De Moulin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't manage to have this blender not leak. I have tried closing it multiple ways and it always leaks. I was about to return it, by my return window closed just a few days ago. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Priscila De Souza

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This set has been nothing but a problem. Parts broke easily and they sent the wrong part to replace it. It barely blends, the food processor was the part that broke and they never sent the right part. It was a complete waste of my money. It is rate that I post a negative review but this was garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bush

customer_reviews.title: Company support lacking. Will keep trying to reach them and revise my review to be fair
customer_reviews.text: Food processor attachment stopped working the firs time I used it to chop onions! Contacting company is difficult . No one to answer , Blender is inconsistent starting and stopping with small volumes. I am regretting this purchase. Always used oster products before.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Allen

customer_reviews.title: The handle on the bottles breaks easily, and it would be so much nicer if ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the bottles breaks easily, and it would be so much nicer if the pitcher were glass. 03/17/17 Update: The bottom plastic piece that screws onto the bottom of the blender cracked a couple months ago and now leaks like a sieve. This blender wasn't even used for anything particularly difficult, nor was it abused. In fact, we hand-washed only. Ugh. I wish I had invested in a glass blender with a damper stick. (Ashley, Christopher's wife)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: It's been great, but after about a year and a half of using it maybe twice a week, I think the motor is starting to burn out. Regretting not investing more in something similar to a Vitamix now. Also kind of a pain to clean this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great, powerful blender solution for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: This blender has been excellent so far. Ever since I bought it, I've been making daily smoothies in the mornings and it works great. I've interchanged the "to-go" blender cups and the main blender body and it works great. For me, it's that the blade spin in reversible, so you aren't constantly shaking the blender or trying to push everything down to the blades with a spoon or something. Great value for the price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This works absolutely no better than my 5yr old black&decker blender from Walmart. Its fair, but nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. She likes her Oster glass jars and uses them on this. Accessories are useful but not critical. Much stronger than our 25 year old blender that died.
customer_reviews.author: p22345

customer_reviews.title: ... this blender for several months now and it works fine for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blender for several months now and it works fine for my purposes. Not the best at crushing large chunks of ice and will not make a completely smooth smoothie but I love the "on the go" cups for just an average smoothie or juice type drink to take to work with me. All of the features work well. It's just not a high end type blender.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I can not express how much I love this product - see updated notes.
customer_reviews.text: I can not express how much I love this product! I got it about a week ago and I would highly recommend. Blenders have come a long way since my last one and this is simply wonderful. I make shakes twice a day for myself and it easily cuts through ice cubes and spinach with ease. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our old Oster blender was 20 years old and I thought it worked fine. But, I wanted something that was a little more powerful and had the individual serving pieces. ZOINKS, blenders have improved the last 20 years!! I read review after review and went with this model versus the Ninja and other popular/expensive brands. I would make the same choice and buy the Versa all over again if I was doing it over.
customer_reviews.author: Bugs4Cy

customer_reviews.title: The Oster BLSTVB-103-000 Versa blender works good but the 5 cup food processor that comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: The Oster BLSTVB-103-000 Versa blender works good but the 5 cup food processor that comes with it is worthless! I'm on my 3rd food processor. The first 2 quit after using it 2 -3 min making almond butter.The motor worked but wouldn't spin the S blade. I guess it stripped the cheap plastic gear.Very Very Frustrating!!! If I would have known the food processor was so bad, I would have ordered a less expensive blender .
customer_reviews.author: kathy j.

customer_reviews.title: Pieces Made of Plastic That Shouldn't Be
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say that I regret purchasing this blender. This is the second time I have had broken pieces to the food processor attachment. In my opinion, it is not made of durable material. For the amount of money it is, the quality of the material should at least be a bit better. I will definitely not be buying Oster products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: April Del Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: Great for the first couple of uses. It has recently started leaking and can’t handle much in the way of frozen fruit. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Great seal, no leaks.  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Blender has held it's seal, and you don't have to hover over it while it works. The 4 bottom pad supports that help it level itself out are a bit of a pain as they come out quite a bit, but they're easily placed back where they belong. It has several settings great settings including for smoothies and frozen drinks. I use it predominantly for breakfast smoothies, and I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever
customer_reviews.text: Best blender ever! I had been looking for a new blender for months after mine stopped working and this was no mistake. All the functions are amazing and you cannot find a trace of solid food. I haven't tried the food processor but I'm excited to use it soon. The only thing is that it may be very noisy, which makes me a little bit nervous as I think it will stop working, but no, it works just fine every time!
customer_reviews.author: Mme. Apple

customer_reviews.title: POWER
customer_reviews.text: Power, quickness, what you need if you make milkshakes and juices daily, if you make a little loud noise but nothing exaggerated
customer_reviews.author: JUAN CARLOSCAICEDO

customer_reviews.title: Meets all my expectations so far.
customer_reviews.text: Grates and slices vegetables easily in the processor bowl. Blends smoothies and soups quickly in the blender. I plan on making seed or nut butter soon. Clean up is quick and easy. I haven't used tge single serving smoothie jars yet only because I make large batches.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie C

customer_reviews.title: It holds up pretty well and is pretty quiet for a blender
customer_reviews.text: We use this blender every day, at least once, if not twice. It holds up pretty well and is pretty quiet for a blender. We weren't even expecting it to include a food processor. It works so well, that I was able to get rid of the larger one. Bonus: the kit includes replacement blades.
customer_reviews.author: e.acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love my blender!! I have been using it every morning for about 2 weeks now. Its powerful enough to make a great smoothie. I have used the food processor once and it was simple enough. So glad I didn't waste my money on a very expensive one. This works just as great as the high priced blenders. And you get cool accessories.
customer_reviews.author: TeressaW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blender for the price. We use it mostly for smoothies made from frozen fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Pants

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases we have ever made. Our friend had Vitamix that cost about $500. This one does everything that did and it is lighter and easier to use. We use it every day. We have made almond and cashew milk. We make smoothies. I don't know how we lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Harrop

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most powerful blender/food processor I've ever used. I love the ability to blend right in the To-Go cups. Makes mornings a breeze! We love to make guacamole, and it's so easy with this machine we make it all the time!! I'm now getting rid of our old blender and small food processor. No need for multiple machines.
customer_reviews.author: MD Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very noisey and it moves all over the counter when in use. I used a rubber shelf liner to sit it on to help it from moving all over otherwise I have to hold it. The single containers are slippery and it is hard to remove the lids because it has 2 bumps on the side of the container that get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Oster Versa for about 2.5 months now and I can honestly say I absolutely LOVE it! It's powerful, has great settings, and is so versatile with all of the attachments. I use it every day for smoothies and the setting works perfectly every time. I've made soups, dips, brownies, and much more with it and everything comes out great. It does run a little loud, so if you have folks in your house with sensitive ears making smoothies in the morning might be out. Otherwise, I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sara N. Holtzman

customer_reviews.title: I guess the bottom is not heavy enough to reduce the vibration but then thats why the whole unit is light and easy to move aroun
customer_reviews.text: Works well and very versatile. I have so many options when using it. Design is a strong plastic. Only downside is that it seems to vibrate alot. I guess the bottom is not heavy enough to reduce the vibration but then thats why the whole unit is light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: kLeen

customer_reviews.title: est blender I've owned. Like it better than vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I like it better than the vitamix we had. Mostly use it to chop up ingredients or make spinach smoothies. Thought the in cup beading option would be a waste, but it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. and Mrs. Louis North

customer_reviews.title: The blender is great. The cups that come with it
customer_reviews.text: The blender is great.The cups that come with it, not so much. The covers hurt trying to get them off and they're not leak proof
customer_reviews.author: Kristi G.

customer_reviews.title: NOT VARIABLE SPEED - Only 3 Speed
customer_reviews.text: NOT VARIABLE SPEED - Only 3 Speed. That said. It's worth the price. YES, it has the round dial like the VM, but it only has 3 positions. It could use a "little" more power however it makes good smoothies. Better than the old style blender it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Betta

customer_reviews.title: I have used this about 5 times a week to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about 5 times a week to make fruit smoothies, very durable and powerful, and after half year of using it, so far no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: XI LUO

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully for anything you need
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully for anything you need. The reverse blend option is wonderful! A+++ would definitely recommend to anyone considering this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Drive shaft screw comes loose
customer_reviews.text: Same issue as others have posted - drive shaft is threaded so repeated use of the 'smoothie' mode, which reverses the motor direction, will cause the drive shaft to come loose. Loved it until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose blender is superb.
customer_reviews.text: This one powerful blender. With the different attachments, it takes the place of a couple of appliances. I have made or chopped a variety of fruits and veggies in it. Food was exactly as I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kay

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful blender,
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful blender, its automatic program makes life eassier. A little bit noisy to my taste, but i did not bought this to be silent but efficient
customer_reviews.author: Cesar R.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best blender I could have asked for..very powerful.. love the 2 cups because I use them all the time....
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this about 9 months ago and would not recommend it because the motor pin on the base that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 9 months ago and would not recommend it because the motor pin on the base that spins the blades came unscrewed. There is no way to remove the bottom base to even attempt to tighten it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The blender is easy to assemble and disassemble
customer_reviews.text: The blender is easy to assemble and disassemble, it is super easy to clean, and it quickly blends ice in with all my smoothies! My only complaint, which is hardly a complaint, is that it can get pretty loud on the "High" adjustment, but it is hardly louder than the average blender, and with the power of 1100 watts, the noise is not even a concern! This blender can do more than the Nutri-bullet, and with the price being almost the same, I would say make the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Foell

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very impressed with this blender and how well it works. For the price and in comparison to the more expensive brands, I am very happy with this product. My only complaint is how loud it is, but it blends things so fast that it's only noisy for a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rabley Family

customer_reviews.title: Day one, not so fun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to specifically start a purification program, to include juicing both fruits and vegetables. Day one, I use the blend-and-go feature. It's pretty loud; not sure how it compares to others. Blended fine. Took off the blades and put on the lid and gave it a shake - stuff flying everywhere. I assumed it wasn't tight, so I grabbed hold and twisted - snapped the handle right off. Broken. After picking up the pieces I gave it another shake....stuff flying everywhere. After further inspection, the lid has a vent hole that is plugged - allegedly - by the flip top. Don't lay the bottles down and it's better to plug the mouth and vent holes with your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to clean. Love the smoothie containers- just blend and go. Makes great salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice A Disogra

customer_reviews.title: Weeeee
customer_reviews.text: I think this makes the world spin faster when it is running. This is the best blender/mixer we have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best blender I have owned. At least you can djust speed and pulse. Ninja is garbage in comparison
customer_reviews.author: rogwabbit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Performance. Food processor big enough to turn 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Performance. Food processor big enough to turn 1 lb. of almonds at one into butter in just 2-3 minutes. So far the best blender for smoothies. I owe the Versa 1300 watts but I needed another one for my vacation home. This one was a hit with the food processor all in one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: LMattern

customer_reviews.title: Great product, right price and worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: works fantastic on smoothies and the other parts help working in the kitchen a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stasio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: but would have loved a glass jar even more. I do love the individual portions/drink units
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Broken after very little use. Useless now.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this less than 30 times. The square stud from the main motor not just snapped off but wore the threads to dust. Very light use. Mostly to make smoothies, guac and salsa. Bought on December 16th 2017. Useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Olson

customer_reviews.title: Loved it the first few times I used it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it the first few times I used it. Leaks and spills out of the bottom now. Makes a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent blender. I love the fact that I can make quick smoothies in small mason jars. It is loud but fast and powerful and cleaning is a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: 2t

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and powerful. Spill-proof and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Supriya Salunkhe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! what a value, you get soooo much WARNING: blades are SHARP!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MAKING PEANUT BUTTER WITH THE FOOD PROCESSOR ATTACHMENT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MAKING PEANUT BUTTER WITH THE FOOD PROCESSOR ATTACHMENT! Definitely a great blender, except when I bought the blender, I thought I'd never use the food processor attachment. Turns out, it is the only attachment that I use! It is truly a great blender! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen Routzhan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks....
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, but the thing leaks. Consistently we find seepage of liquids from the seal onto the motor housing. It is becoming a pain to clean. Seek another product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A Crance

customer_reviews.title: much better than the TV blenders!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine however at times the cups leak and some greens don't get liquidity and you have to blend longer. Much better than than the TV blenders!
customer_reviews.author: Isdageek

customer_reviews.title: good product, I love the Oster brand I just ...
customer_reviews.text: good product, I love the Oster brand I just think the base of this item could have been more sturdy, it works for what I wanted it for. perfect for puree'
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Springer

customer_reviews.title: with persistence and a whole lot of muscle I was finally able to dislodge it and now I am quite pleased with my high performance
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a couple of weeks ago that it was impossible to unscrew the jar from the base, however, with persistence and a whole lot of muscle I was finally able to dislodge it and now I am quite pleased with my high performance blender. I guess the blender jar is sturdier than it looks
customer_reviews.author: Trini

customer_reviews.title: perfect everything.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed all in one machine..perfect everything..plus the color matches the kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product. It replaced my 30+ year old Oster. This new one is fantastic! Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. My wife uses it for making salsa and mole sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Bcheever

customer_reviews.title: Poor security, continue to work even if the material ...
customer_reviews.text: when you have hard vegetables to mix, it doesn't really work.... Poor security, continue to work even if the material is not fixed.
customer_reviews.author: pallas

customer_reviews.title: Driveshaft gets broken
customer_reviews.text: After 1 and a half month of use, driveshaft is broken internally I dont recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO G

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender. Smoothie function works great
customer_reviews.text: Great Blender. Smoothie function works great! We have used this everyday since we purchased it to make smoothies and have had no issues! I love the OSTER VERSA! Great machine for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Burofsky

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. Its pretty noisy though
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. Its pretty noisy though.. If I use it in the morning, no one sleeps through it!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! I am constantly making protein shakes & smoothies.. This works GREAT! And I love the food processor.. I use it often for salsas & hummus dip! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Weismiller

customer_reviews.title: Makes great Margaritas.
customer_reviews.text: We really like this. Makes great frozen Margaritas and smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Boy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: This blender has power to spare when creating smoothies, and icee's.
customer_reviews.author: FletcherTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Broke after light user under 10 months
customer_reviews.text: To our complete surprise, the blender broke after 10 months being rarely used... It may be bad luck but we completelly lost trust on the brand. While working, it was great and very simple to use. Cleaning was simple and the food processor was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Marcos Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this...use it all the time. great for slicing dicing veggies and making smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this. Used the blender and smoothie glasses and they work great for my protein smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Neutz

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatile Blender
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful blender! Powerful motor pulverizes and blends fruits and vegetables to make great smoothies and drinks. Easily blends whole fruits (minus the cores) and can create very smooth baby foods. Crushes ice with no problem. The single serve cups are ideal for taking your drink with you, but I prefer to use the large blender to make drinks and then pour into the single serve cup as I don't think that the single serve blender attachment blends as well. The blender also comes with a separate food processor but I cannot rate the food processor because I haven't used it.
customer_reviews.author: rodorsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. We've had this product for a few months now and we can't say one bad thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer MCP

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't been a year yet and my pitcher is leaking. Not sure if I have a warranty or not. How do I get a new pitcher?? I see I have a 7 year warranty. Other than that, It worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap that they make look up.
customer_reviews.text: I feel they are misleading with the design. They have a radial selection but that is just between three speed settings, it is not a variable speed. These speeds are also not great, slow is too slow, fast is too fast, medium is basically slow. The 'pre-programed' speed is also not great as it just moves the blender all around with it's jerky starts and stops. The carafe design is also bad, two part blade design that will leak eventually and will require constant fiddling with. All in all I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine in the beginning and out of nowhere I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine in the beginning and out of nowhere I was using it. it made a loud noise and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: martine

customer_reviews.title: ... the food processor and it broke the tab real easily. The 20 year plus cuisinart is still more ...
customer_reviews.text: We dropped the lid to the food processor and it broke the tab real easily. The 20 year plus cuisinart is still more durable. Update 6 months later the other tab broke and now the food processor attachment is worthless. If you are buying this because of the added feature of a food processor, don't bother. It won't last and Oster will not sell you a replacement food processor or parts. Looking for a 3 d printer file of the lid so I can print a new one and beef up the design.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've used this blender almost every single day for the past six months. So far so good. No complaints. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does all it says and more. Very fast to crush ice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anne

product_meta.title: Oster BLSTVB-103-000 Versa 1100-watt Professional Performance Blender with Two 20-Ounce Blend'N Go Cups
product_meta.description: Important Made in USA Origin Disclaimer: For certain items sold by Walmart on Walmart.com, the displayed country of origin information may not be accurate or consistent with manufacturer information. For updated, accurate country of origin data, it is recommended that you rely on product packaging or manufacturer information. Powerful performance at the touch of a button! The Oster Versa Performance Blender is superiorly designed with a 1000-watt motor and matching speed to crush ice, make smoothies, whole juices, puree soups, chop veggies and more. The BPA-free, Eastman Tritan, plastic jar combined with the reversing blades option creates a forceful blending vortex as ingredients are pushed from the walls of the jar, down into the blade, giving restaurant-quality results every time. The pre-programmed settings on this Oster Versa blender with food processing and Blend N' Go accessories take the guesswork out of mixing. Featuring a number of accessories, including a five-cup food processor, this blender has the power to turn every party into a success, whipping up homemade salsa, guacamole and dips with ease. Combine fruits and veggies with this black Oster performance blender to take them on the run with the Blend 'N Go Cups two 20 oz bottles, which can perform double duty as water bottles throughout the day. A seven-year warranty and recipe booklet are included
feature_bullets: Powerful: 1100 watt motor for blending perfect smoothies
64-ounce BPA-Free Tritan(r) Jar, 5-cup food processor with slicing/shredding disk and a chopping blade, Two 20-oz blend'n go cups
Control: Combination of manual settings for precise control as well as pre-programmed settings so it can do the thinking for you
Reversing: Blades alternate forward & backward; drawing food & frozen ingredients into the blade giving perfect results time after time
7 year warranty backs up the durability and quality; recipes to inspire creativity in the kitchen

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
